  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2668</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">How a Magnifying glass functions.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wie ein Vergrößerungsglas arbeitet.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comment une loupe fonctionne.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Como um vidro ampliando funciona.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Come una lente d'ingrandimento funziona.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πώς ένα ενισχύοντας γυαλί λειτουργεί.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cómo funciona una lupa.</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An interative animation of the functioning of a magnifing glass. The lens canbe moved to observe change in size and position of the image.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">physics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">optics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">optical phenomena</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnify</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine interative Animation des Arbeitens eines magnifing 
Glases. Das Objektiv canbe bewog, um Änderung in der Größe 
und in Position des Bildes zu beobachten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation interative du fonctionnement d'un verre 
magnifing. Le canbe d'objectif s'est déplacé pour observer le 
changement de la taille et de la position de l'image.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation interative de funcionar de um vidro 
magnifing. O canbe da lente moveu-se para observar a mudança no
tamanho e na posição da imagem.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione interative del funzionamento di un vetro 
magnifing. Il canbe dell'obiettivo si è mosso per osservare il 
cambiamento nel formato e nella posizione dell'immagine.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια interative ζωτικότητα της λειτουργίας ενός 
magnifing γυαλιού. Ο φακός canbe κινήθηκε για να 
παρατηρήσει την αλλαγή στο μέγεθος και τη θέση της εικόνας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación interative del funcionamiento de un cristal
magnifing. El canbe de la lente se movió para observar el 
cambio de tamaño y la posición de la imagen.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Optik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">optische Phänomene</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">vergrößern Sie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">systeme optique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">phénomènes optiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
